Uses of Interface
nl.naturalis.common.function.Relation

  • Packages that use Relation 
    Package Description
    nl.naturalis.common
    Contains various static method utility classes for working with strings, arrays, collections, etc.
    nl.naturalis.common.check
    Classes related to checking preconditions
    nl.naturalis.common.function
    Classes related to functional programming.
